faqs.question: Is it really free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, all tools are completely free. There are no additional fees or hidden costs.

faqs.question: Do I need to install any application?
faqs.answer: No, all tools run in your web browser. No software download or installation is required.

faqs.question: Do I need to provide personal information?
faqs.answer: Most tools can be used anonymously. Some input data is saved in your browser, but it is not sent externally. For details, please check our Privacy Policy.

faqs.question: Are the calculation results accurate?
faqs.answer: Yes, we do our best to provide accurate information. However, due to the nature of the tools, please use the calculation results as a reference.

faqs.question: Which browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: We support the latest versions of Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Microsoft Edge.

faqs.question: Can I use it on my smartphone or tablet?
faqs.answer: Yes, this site is responsive and can be used comfortably on various devices.

faqs.question: Is my calculation history saved?
faqs.answer: Some tools save your calculation history in your browser for your convenience. This data is not sent externally.

faqs.question: Are there ads?
faqs.answer: We may display some ads to maintain the operation of the site. We appreciate your understanding.

faqs.question: Are you planning to add new tools?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are always considering adding new tools to meet the needs of our users. If you have any requests, please let us know using the feedback form.

faqs.question: I don't know how to use the tools.
faqs.answer: We have a user guide on each tool's page, so please refer to that. If you still have problems, please contact us using the inquiry form.

faqs.question: The site is not displayed correctly.
faqs.answer: First, please check if your browser is the latest version. If the problem persists, please contact us.

faqs.question: Can I use it offline?
faqs.answer: No, our tools are only available online.

faqs.question: Is there a dark mode?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can switch between dark and light mode with the switch in the upper right corner of the screen.

faqs.question: How can I share my calculation results?
faqs.answer: Some tools have a button to share the calculation results. Please use that.

faqs.question: Can I switch the language?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can switch between supported languages from the language switcher in the header.

faqs.question: Who runs this site?
faqs.answer: Please see the 'About' page for information about the operator.

faqs.question: I found a bug. How can I report it?
faqs.answer: We would appreciate it if you could report it using the feedback form. Thank you for your cooperation.

faqs.question: Is the data I enter safe?
faqs.answer: Yes, we respect your privacy and strive to protect the data you enter. Please see our Privacy Policy for details.

faqs.question: Please tell me about the tool's calculation logic.
faqs.answer: The basic calculation logic of each tool may be explained on the help page.

faqs.question: Is membership registration required?
faqs.answer: No, you can use all the tools immediately without registering as a member.

faqs.question: How long does it take to get a reply to my inquiry?
faqs.answer: We usually reply within a few business days, but it may take longer depending on the content of your inquiry.
